title: BRIEF-Horizon North Logistics Announces Amendment And Extension Of Credit Facility
text:
BRIEF-Horizon North Logistics Announces Amendment And Extension Of Credit Facility

Stock Markets 17 minutes ago (Oct 03, 2019 21:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Horizon North Logistics Announces Amendment And Extension Of Credit Facility Oct 3 (Reuters) - Horizon North Logistics Inc : * . ANNOUNCES AMENDMENT AND EXTENSION OF CREDIT FACILITY * MAINTAINS EXISTING REVOLVING COMMITMENT OF $150 MILLION * EXTENDS MATURITY DATE OF CREDIT FACILITY BY 12 MONTHS TO SEPTEMBER 30, 2021

BRIEF-Horizon North Logistics Announces Amendment And Extension Of Credit Facility
description: BRIEF-Horizon North Logistics Announces Amendment And Extension Of Credit Facility
